title: Process Termination for Cause
description: Following an investigation, a decision has been made to terminate an employee for gross misconduct.

tasks.description: Prepare the termination paperwork, including the separation agreement and final paycheck.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP prepares all necessary offboarding documents.

tasks.description: Schedule and conduct the termination meeting with the employee and their manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP and manager deliver the termination notice to the employee.

tasks.description: Process the termination in the HRIS and coordinate with IT to deactivate all system access immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP updates the employee's status to 'Terminated' and triggers IT de-provisioning.
